name: listings
description: Overview of all available crypto currencies, use the returned id to retrieve more data on a specific crypto currency on the ticker endpoint.

name: v1_ticker
description: Coin and token prices updated every 5 minutes.

limit.description: Limit the number of returned results. The default value is 100.
limit.title: Limit

start.description: Sets the first element to be fetched, all requests are ordered by the Marketcap. That means the order of the returned elements can change over time.
start.title: Start

convert.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.
convert.title: Convert

name: v1_tickert_for_specific_currency
description: Coin and token prices updated every 5 minutes.

convert.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.
convert.title: Convert

name: v1_global
description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.

convert.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.
convert.title: Convert

name: v2_ticker
description: Coin and token prices updated every 5 minutes.

limit.description: Limit the number of returned results. The default value is 100, use '0' for all available data.
limit.title: Limit

start.description: Sets the first element to be fetched, all requests are ordered by the Marketcap. That means the order of the returned elements can change over time.
start.title: Start

convert.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.
convert.title: Convert

structure.description: sets the structure of the data field as either array or name-value pair style. Possible values are 'dictionary' for name-value pair style and 'array' for array style.
structure.title: Structure

sort.description: returned results can be sorted by: 'id', 'rank' (means marketcap), 'volume_24h', 'percent_change_24h' default sorting is by rank. In addition it can be sorted by: 'price', 'percent_change_1h', 'percent_change_7d', 'circulating_supply' and 'name'.
sort.title: Sort

name: v2_ticker_for_specific_currency
description: Get ticker data of a specified coin by providing the 'id' or the 'website_slug' of the coin as can be found by calling listings endpoint.

name: v2_global
description: Get global market information at a glance.

convert.description: In addition to the USD values the converted values will be deliveredin the requested currency. Possible fiat conversion target values are: ' USD', 'EUR', 'GBP', 'RUB', 'JPY', 'CAD', 'KRW', 'PLN' it is also possible to convert to other cryptocurrencies like: 'BTC', 'ETH', 'XRP', 'LTC' and 'BCH'.
convert.title: Convert
